===========
CheckPassPy
===========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/chackpasspy.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/chackpasspy

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/DaielChom/chackpasspy.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/DaielChom/chackpasspy

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/chackpasspy/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://chackpasspy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




Verifica si el string que se le pasa a la función puede ser considerada como una contraseña segura.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://chackpasspy.readthedocs.io.
